name: Second Chances
description:
You are a soul trapped in hell. One day a mysterious benefactor has showed you the way out. Unfortunately you don't have much time left and your time is cut short with every jump you take. Will you escape the 6 levels of hell?

Having Trouble? See a Walkthrough here:
